name: Rottenwood Lake
description:
This game was crafted with love in a weekend for the Haunted PS1 game jam. Some bugs here and there are expected.

Controls:

Mouse - Look around

WASD/Arrow keys - Move the boat

E - Interact

Click - Fish

Credits:

selewi & inflatableplatypus - Coding

skcotterell- Modelling & Texturing

Romain Rope - Music & SFX

Tozy - Game and narrative design
